title: N172 Old Judge Glasscock coming in this upcoming week. Car repairs.

posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge Glasscock coming in this upcoming week. Car repairs.
posts.post_content:
N172 Old Judge Glasscock SGC 4.5 VG-EX+-apparently specks of white. Please check front scan. $850.00.

Card is in now Friday March 10, 2023.

Need money for car repairs for inspection.

S/h is $5.25.
